comments.body: What if more than a single test runs in the same project (I think it's possible with current e2e job setup)? Maybe we should add a filter using real namespace name?
We filter for the real namespace, but using In operator. Added a comment that it serves a purpose of avoiding collisions.

I didn't realize 'dummy' was the real namespace name. Why not use the e2e namespace (which, I think, is unique)? However, it's not very important, so feel free to ignore this comment if it's too much work or you disagree.

In the actual filter, I use the real e2e namespace name: string(f.Namespace.Name). 'dummy' is not a real namespace name, in fact I expect there won't be such namespace. I intentionally use it as a namespace path argument to emphasize it doesn't matter.

I think any changes here would be small and effortless, so I'm fine with applying whatever you suggest. I'm just not 100% sure what is your proposal. Do you think it needs some more comments to avoid confusion?
Sorry, I missed that you actually pass 2 values with In, for some reason I thought you only pass dummy. Please disregard my comment, everything is fine.

I can't comment on lines outside of this change so adding here:

I believe in line 124 you should be checking that you actually receive both metrics. Now you only check that you don't get extra metrics.
